title: Ticket #215: Add a nightly test that tests DAG recovery
description:
We should have a test that tests DAG recovery -- I need to figure out how to fit this into the test setup, though.

See job_dagman_retry_recovery -- this isn't quite working yet.
remarks:
job_dagman_retry.run causes a dag to fail and drop a rescue dag. It then clears the issue that made the node fails and it then reruns via the rescue dag. Is this sufficient? bt

No, a rescue DAG is totally separate from recovery mode. wenger 2009-05-27

Made this test a while ago, just made changes that should fix the failures on MacOS. wenger 2009-06-23.
